Data rarely comes perfectly clean and ready for analysis. Preprocessing can often be a time-consuming task. Cleanup provides a set of functions designed to simplify the process of cleaning your data. With this package, you can easily perform a comprehensive diagnostic of your dataset's quality, making data preparation faster and more efficient.

# Installation

```{r echo=TRUE}
# Installation
install.packages("cleanup")

# Load
library(cleanup)
```

# Usage

```{r, include = FALSE}
library(cleanup)
```
